text:
Hi All, I have made the some more changes  in HEXA theme <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website/hexa-theme-by-unique-coderz> including

1. Theme Colors 
2. Module optimizations
3. Multi Language
4. SEO optimized
5. Drag and Drop options
6. Pre Build  Reusable sections  
7. Easy to  create the pages
